question:
Consider the following statements about the Eka Movement:
  1. It was essentially a peasant struggle
  2. The objective of the movement was to resist the attempts of the landlords to take more than recorded rents from tenants
Â  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Eka Movement was a peasant struggle which was started in Hardoi, Bahraich and Sitapur during the end of 1921. The main reason of the movement was higher rent even more than than 50% of recorded rent in some of the areas. Both are correct statements.
